sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The reiserfsprogs package contains the debugreiserfs, mkreiserfs, reiserfsck, resize_reiserfs and unpack programs.

sect3.title: debugreiserfs
sect3.para: debugreiserfs can sometimes help to solve problems with reiserfs filesystems. If it is called without options it prints the super block of any reiserfs filesystem found on the device.

sect3.title: mkreiserfs
sect3.para: mkreiserfs creates a reiserfs file system.

sect3.title: reiserfsck
sect3.para: reiserfsck checks a reiserfs file system.

sect3.title: resize_reiserfs
sect3.para: resize_reiserfs is used to resize an unmounted reiserfs file system

sect3.title: unpack
sect3.para: No description is currently available for unpack.
